code: import React from'react';import'./Projects.css';import{projects}from'../Utils/ProjectsData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const scrollLeft=()=>{console.log('Scrolling Left');const grid=document.getElementById('projects-grid');if(grid){grid.scrollLeft-=300;}};const scrollRight=()=>{console.log('Scrolling Right');const grid=document.getElementById('projects-grid');if(grid){grid.scrollLeft+=300;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"projects",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"title",children:["Featured ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"themeText",children:"Projects"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-grid-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-arrow left",onClick:scrollLeft,children:"<"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects-grid",id:"projects-grid",children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.image,alt:project.title,className:"project-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"project-title",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"category",children:project.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"tech-stack",children:["Tech Stacks: ",project.techStack]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"project-description",children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-links",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:project.codeLink,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"code-base",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-github"})," Code Base"]})})]})]},project.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-arrow right",onClick:scrollRight,children:">"})]})]})});};export default Projects;
